meta.name: description
meta.content: Here you'll find resources, tools and news dedicated to artists and musicians reaching and engaging their fans as well as growing their career.

meta.content: Here you'll find resources, tools and news dedicated to artists and musicians reaching and engaging their fans as well as growing their career.

aside.div: For resources and best practices designed to help you in a changing environment, please visit yt.be/creatoracademytoolkits.

div.h1: Welcome to the biggest stage on earth
div.h2: Promote your music. Engage your fans. Get the most out of YouTube.
Promote your music. Engage your fans. Get the most out of YouTube.

section.class: yta-feature yta-feature--buffer-v yta-feature--reverse yta-feature--scene-l yta-markdown yta-home__channels

article.p: We’ve launched our Official Artist Channels, designed as a one-stop-shop to help artists engage with millions of fans around the world.
Whether you’re signed or independent, you can get rewarded for your work.
What’s more, for you this means greater ownership of your presence across the platform, including on our new YouTube Music app.

p.a: Learn more about Official Artist Channels

div.class: ytc-js-tabber-panel ytc-tabber__panels-panel yta-feature yta-feature--buffer-v-t yta-markdown yta-feature--scene-r promo-community promotion-6920b291ce81fb0e

article.h2: Connect with fans in unique ways
article.p: It’s all about meaningful and real connections! With Community, YouTube provides artists with a unique way to amplify their music by directly engaging with millions of fans.
You can use Community posts to interact with your audience through text, live videos, images, animated GIFs, and more.
You can respond to comments, read private messages, see your credited videos or view your channel’s subscriber list.

div.class: ytc-js-tabber-panel ytc-tabber__panels-panel yta-feature yta-feature--buffer-v-t yta-markdown yta-feature--scene-r promo-live promotion-834633eaa95f3243

article.p: It’s never been easier to give fans a sneak peek, bring them behind-the-scenes or make a big announcement.
You can reach millions with just a touch and bring them along on your journey.

div.class: ytc-js-tabber-panel ytc-tabber__panels-panel yta-feature yta-feature--buffer-v-t yta-markdown yta-feature--scene-r promo-ticketing promotion-a2f673bd9af76ea0

article.h2: Promote your tour and sell tickets
article.p: Whether on platform or off, YouTube is committed to helping artists build meaningful connections with fans.
Now, you can promote your live events on YouTube.
If you’re going on tour in the United States, and selling tickets via Ticketmaster or Eventbrite, YouTube can feature your tour dates within your video watch pages.

section.class: yta-feature yta-feature--buffer-v yta-feature--reverse yta-feature--scene-l yta-markdown yta-home__analytics

article.p: One of the most advanced suite of analytics to help you be in the know. Learn more about how your fans around the world engage with your work. Connect with them when and where it matters.
